function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Utilization of AI models for COVID-19 predictions and drug discovery","Impact":"Incorrect predictions leading to ineffective treatments or resource misallocation","Mitigation":"Regular validation and verification of AI model outputs with real-world data","Technologies":"AI for data analysis and prediction","People":"Health authorities, patients","Owner":"Data scientists, researchers, health authorities"},{"Description":"Consolidation of biomedical data for predictive drug combination therapies","Impact":"Ineffective drug combinations leading to worsening of patient condition","Mitigation":"Rigorous testing and validation of drug combination predictions in clinical trials","Technologies":"Biomedical data analytics and prediction platforms","People":"Severely ill COVID-19 patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Biomedical data analysts, healthcare providers, pharmaceutical companies"}]}
